channel.title: Make a command ::points
channel.description:
i need to make a command called ::points that tells u how many pk points you have]
its a 317 server base= Project Insanity
if any one knows id really appreicate the help!
i have the pk shop. u talk to him and it shows points
but i wanna type ::points and it shows points

item.title: Make a command ::points
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

You’re welcome, and I can tell you’re new to PI.

Read full topic

item.title: Make a command ::points
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

how come everytime i paste a command it goes straight line instead of like 3 setences7

BUT THAT WORKED THANKYOU

Read full topic

item.title: Make a command ::points
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

That’s because it’s a Delta command.
Convert it.
Use this:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("points")) {
c.sendMessage("You have @red@" +c.pkPoints+ " PK points@bla@ to spend at the PK Shop.");
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Make a command ::points
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

[quote=“tyttty, post:2, topic:368151”]i prisume u mean pk points it would be soemting like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("points")) { sM("You have "+points+" to spend at the pk shop!"); }[/quote]

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("points")) { c.sendMessage("You have "+pkPoints+" to spend at the pk shop!"); }

Just guessing that’s what its declared as.

Read full topic
